body: This a question mostly for mods, but yeah some people might know the answer, Is it possible to clean my infractions list?
body_tagged: This a question mostly for mods, but yeah some people might know the answer, Is it possible to clean my infractions list?
title: What can I do to clean my infractions list?

replies.body: I got my first infraction yesterday and am very sad,  I would like to talk to a moderator about it cause somebody else was doing it To and I don't think they got a punishment
replies.body_tagged: I got my first infraction yesterday and am very sad,  I would like to talk to a moderator about it cause somebody else was doing it To and I don't think they got a punishment

replies.body: No, infractions can not be removed from your history at this stage.
replies.body_tagged: No, infractions can not be removed from your history at this stage.

replies.body: Eh okay :/ what are the infractions that can get me perm ban so that I can avoid them
replies.body_tagged: Eh okay :/ what are the infractions that can get me perm ban so that I can avoid them

reply_to.body: No, infractions can not be removed from your history at this stage.
reply_to.body_tagged: No, infractions can not be removed from your history at this stage.

replies.body: Basically every infraction can,  but only if you do it a number of times
replies.body_tagged: Basically every infraction can,  but only if you do it a number of times

reply_to.body: Eh okay :/ what are the infractions that can get me perm ban so that I can avoid them
reply_to.body_tagged: Eh okay :/ what are the infractions that can get me perm ban so that I can avoid them

replies.body: If you break a rule more than once, you will most likely receive a more severe punishment next time. However as long as you abide by the rules you won't have anything to worry about! ;)
replies.body_tagged: If you break a rule more than once, you will most likely receive a more severe punishment next time. However as long as you abide by the rules you won't have anything to worry about! ;)

reply_to.body_tagged: Eh okay :/ what are the infractions that can get me perm ban so that I can avoid them

replies.body: I dunno, my infractions got wiped :/
replies.body_tagged: I dunno, my infractions got wiped :/

reply_to.body: No, infractions can not be removed from your history at this stage.
reply_to.body_tagged: No, infractions can not be removed from your history at this stage.

replies.body: Yeah that occurred a while ago (everyone's infractions were wiped I believe). It was unexpected and it actually caused quite a few issues. Hopefully it won't happen again! :P
replies.body_tagged: Yeah that occurred a while ago (everyone's infractions were wiped I believe). It was unexpected and it actually caused quite a few issues. Hopefully it won't happen again! :P

reply_to.body_tagged: I dunno, my infractions got wiped :/

replies.body: Hacking is the main thing that will get you banned, as well as some more things which can be found here: https://www.avicus.net/rules.
replies.body_tagged: Hacking is the main thing that will get you banned, as well as some more things which can be found here: https://www.avicus.net/rules.

replies.body:
It is possible to get punished for excessive infractions, however, two infractions from a while ago don't put you at any risk of being punished.

Just follow the rules and you'll be fine.
replies.body_tagged:
It is possible to get punished for excessive infractions, however, two infractions from a while ago don't put you at any risk of being punished.

Just follow the rules and you'll be fine.
